attributes.action: A petition for the government to fix the broken sen system.
attributes.additional_details: Sen children are being let down across the country. Which is very unfair as every children has the eight to education most sen children are being left without support needed .which to that can't attend school .which has a knock on effect on childs mental health and there families.
attributes.background:
Provide schools with more funding to support sen children's needs most sen children are not getting the support they need due to lack of funds for schools to support each child . Most children are let down by the broken system. 
Make it easier for parents to access support for there child

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

Increasing funding to support children with special educational needs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/658269

Provide funding to increase school places for children with SEND
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/651164
